spell.name: Acid Dart
entries: You hurl a shimmering green dart of acidic energy at a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} acid damage immediately and an additional {@damage 1d4} acid damage at the start of your next turn.

The spellâ€™s damage (both initial and subsequent) increases by {@damage 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4}, {@damage 2d4}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4}, {@damage 3d4}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d4}, {@damage 4d4}).

spell.name: Electric Charge
entries: Sparks of lightning leap from your outstretched hand. Make a ranged spell attack against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} lightning damage. If you cast this cantrip during your last turn, the sparks build and the size of all the damage dice for this cantrip increases to {@damage 1d10}. It increases to {@damage 1d12} the turn after if you cast it again. If you did not cast this cantrip during your last turn, the damage dice resets to d8.
This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).

spell.name: Glacial Blade

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails.

On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and any weapon it wields is encased in a brittle sheath of ice until the start of your next turn. If the target uses its action to make an attack with a weapon, it immediately takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage, and the spell ends.

At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for making a weapon attack increases to {@damage 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@damage 1d8} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Miasmic Blade

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and a cloud of malodorous gas fills a 5-foot space centered on the target until the start of your next turn. Any creature that ends their turn in this cloud takes {@damage 1d8} poison damage.

At 5th level, the weapon attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} poison damage to the target, and the damage from the gas cloud increases to {@damage 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@damage 1d8} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Scourge
entries: A dark green energy shoots from the tip of your finger and infects the target. Make a ranged spell attack against a single target, dealing {@damage 1d8} poison damage on a successful attack. If the target has any temporary hit points, this cantrip removes all of these hit points before dealing damage. A creature immune to poison is also immune to this effect.
This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).

spell.name: Warcry
entries: You let out a howl that can heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature in a 10-foot cone must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} thunder damage and become deafened until the start of your next turn.
This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th ({@damage 4d6}).
